code: import React,{useState}from'react';import ProductCart from'./Components/ProductCart.js';import ProductFeed from'./Components/ProductFeed.js';import images from'./Images/Images.js';import'./styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const addToCart=product=>{setCart(prevCart=>{if(prevCart.find(item=>item.id===product.id)){return prevCart.map(item=>item.id===product.id?{...item,quantity:item.quantity+1}:item);}else{return[...prevCart,{...product,quantity:1}];}});alert('Item added to cart');};const removeFromCart=product=>{setCart(prevCart=>{const productInCart=prevCart.find(item=>item.id===product.id);if(productInCart.quantity===1){return prevCart.filter(item=>item.id!==productInCart.id);}else{return prevCart.map(item=>item.id===product.id?{...item,quantity:item.quantity-1}:item);}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Title-Container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images.logo,alt:"Cozy Threads Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{href:"#",onClick:e=>{render('home');},children:" Cozy Threads"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"#",onClick:e=>{render('home');},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images.home,alt:"Home Symbol"}),"Store"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"#cart",onClick:e=>{render('cart');},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images.cart,alt:"Cart Symbol"}),"Cart (",cart.reduce((total,item)=>total+item.quantity,0),")"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{id:"feed",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductFeed,{addToCart:addToCart}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCart,{cart:cart,removeFromCart:removeFromCart})]})]});function render(page){document.querySelectorAll('.page').forEach(el=>el.style.display='none');document.getElementById(page).style.display='block';}}export default App;
